title: Troubleshoot Failed Live Stream Start
description: A scheduled live stream for a gaming tournament fails to start at its designated time.

tasks.description: Check the connection status of the streaming encoder.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the encoder is connected but not sending data.

tasks.description: Verify the stream key is correctly configured in the broadcasting software.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a mismatch between the configured stream key and the one assigned to the event.

tasks.description: Instruct the tournament organizer to update the stream key in their software and restart the stream.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the correct stream key and clear instructions, resolving the issue.
